metadata.description: A vast expanse of irradiated desert stretching as far as the eye can see. The sandy dunes are dotted with strange rock formations, abandoned vehicles, and the occasional twisted tree.
metadata.atmosphere: Foreboding, eerie, and unforgiving, with an undercurrent of dread and unease.
metadata.significance: Breeding ground for the mutated creatures that Vivas Guardians must contend with, as well as a testing ground for new technologies and strategies.
